title: Zero to Ninety
description: “Zero to Ninety” takes you through the first ninety days of your dating experience. Branas uses foundations of attraction in addition to a simple equation to have you well on your way to success in your dating life. Utilizing her present day experience, Branas offers you exercises and real-time examples needed to keep yourself authentic in order to make the choices that are right for you when engaging a new potential partner.Although the focus of this book is geared towards “women seeking women,” the content is applicable to any person embarking on a new relationship. Open and raw, “Zero to Ninety” will give you a new perspective on finding love and the tools needed to build the strong foundation necessary for a blooming relationship.
author: Jess Branas
